title: Weird disconnect bug
body:
Has been happening a lot since the last patch. I will suddenly be unable to move, use abilities, ping my latency, etc but I will still be able to see everything that is happening around me with 0 lag and utilize the chat. These micro disconnects sometimes prompt the "attempting to reconnect" window but not  always. I'd say  it only prompts it 20% of the time. They last anywhere from 20 seconds to a full minute.

I checked if anything was open in the background that could be causing it and I don't see anything out of the norm. I checked my ping via command prompt and I was not having any packet loss issues. My ping will stay in the low 60s the entire time and remain in the low 60s after without any spikes. I tried doing a client repair and computer/router/modem restarts it has not helped. Sometimes my girlfriend will be playing on her computer next to me and while I'm having issues she is unaffected.

replies.body: You might be having a local issue within your own network that's cutting you off from reaching or holding on to our game servers.  A client repair would not really help with solving connection issues, but restarting your router was a good step.  Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and rule out any possibilities in your network environment.  That should do the trick, but let me know if you run into issues.
This is happening To me as well. Would love a fix
